posts.message:
Hi guys, as we all know, PayPal repeatedly announced that it supports Egypt now in both Sending and receiving money. we can see that from their  Offerings website http://goo.gl/iLWxuD.

However, i get "PayPal accounts opened in this country or region currently cannot withdraw funds. We regret any inconvenience this may cause you." Any one successfully received anything from his PayPal and how ??
posts.caption: paypal.com
posts.description: Use PayPal to send and receive money worldwide. With over 230 million accounts worldwide and growing, we help you securely, easily and quickly pay and get paid locally and across borders. Select a country or region to find out about PayPal’s offerings:

posts.message: If you rely on user agent strings, perhaps this is why it's a good idea to rethink that approach. I said it once ;) Remember?
posts.caption: msdn.microsoft.com
posts.description: Sites that rely on the user-agent string should be updated to modern techniques, such as feature detection, adaptive layout, and other modern practices.

posts.message: After being a while with the company of "gulp" I can say it confidently .. if you don't have a task runner -specially gulp- in your development environment .. you are missing a lot of power .. and most importantly a lot of fun  :)
posts.caption: blog.engineyard.com
posts.description: In this post, we discuss how to manage frontend development and deployment using Gulp, a task runner.

posts.message: I am yet to try it , but it looks to be promising , and could bridge the native/hybrid gap
posts.caption: parleys.com
posts.description: J2ObjC is a new build tool that translates Java library source for use with iOS apps. The tool transpiles Java code to Objective-C during the build, as no hand-editing of the generated code is necessary. J2ObjC supports most Java language and runtime features required by client-side application deve…
